description: Cinderella is the delightful retelling of the classic fairy tale of a beautiful young maiden who is at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and stepsisters. When her wish is granted, Cinderella finds herself at the ball, and the prince finds himself in love, but Cinderella disappears at the stroke of midnight. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and the proper use of adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for levels H and K.
